transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haanji madam, kaun bol rahe hain?
Customer: Haanji boliye. Sir, good afternoon. Neha baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haanji madam.
Customer: Ji sir, batayiye kaise ho aap?
Customer: Madam, theek hoon. Main kal aapke Preeti Rathore ka mujhe mere paas phone aaya tha ki sir aap apna
Executive: Haanji haanji meri abhi abhi baat hui hai unse na wo mere matlab gayi thi unke paas mein discussion karne ke liye. Ek minute rukiye main aapki baat karwati hoon.
Customer: Sir unse kya baat karni hai madam wo to weh social media baat hai aisa kahin hota hai aap pehle proposal do, aap bolo mujhse ki last wali deal kara denge last month jo aapne pay kiya wo kara denge. Ab wo kehne lagi ki ab wo ho nahi payega. Aisa kahin hota madam?
Customer: Humne to pehli baar IndiaMART se pehli baar 10 saal se 10-11 saal ho gaye IndiaMART. Humne to pehli baar aisa aisa kabhi nahi dekha na kisi company ne aisa hamare sath kiya.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haanji haanji madam bataye. Haanji bataye. Aap hai Chitranshi, Chitranshi, Chitranshi. Main ye keh rahi thi ki bilkul Preeti ji ne jo hai na wo rate thoda kam de diya hai, theek hai. But wo rate 28000 hi ja raha hai. 28000 plus 18% GST.
Customer: To wo unse by default ho gaya.
Executive: Wo bhi hum chahte the wo 35000 se na ho.
Customer: Unhone unhone unhone mujhe whatsapp pe likh ke bheja, orally wo bataya ye bhi kaha ki main aapko aapne jo last time pe
Executive: Bilkul bilkul bataya aapko.
Customer: Wo suno to aapne jo last time pay kiya aap wahi pay kar do. Emergency maine kaha time nikal ke unhe pay kiya. Aisa kahin hota madam? Sab aur unhone sab written mein diya hai ye ki orally bol diya ho whatsapp pe dala, mail pe proposal bhi dala.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aisa kaise hota hai? Ye to aap unprofessional kaam kar rahe ho aisa thodi na hota hai. Pehle customer se keh do ki aap is aap mein aapko ₹5 ki cheez ₹2 mein aap madam aap suno to madam aap customer ko jaake ₹5 cheez ₹2 ka aapko de dunga. Theek hai aap jab wo ₹2 dal de tab keh do ki sir ye nahi mil payegi.
Customer: To ye kaun sa logic kaun sa wo raha hai aap batayiye.
Executive: Main bolun sir?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Beshak aapki baat jo hai na main sahi maan rahi hoon ki theek hai unko nahi batana chahiye, theek hai. But unse by mistake hua hai aisa nahi hai ki unhone jaan boojh ke kiya hua hai. By mistake hua hai.
Customer: Are madam jab mujhe unhone jab jo jab unhone kaha ki sir aapke last time jo aapne pay kiya tha wo aap pay kar do. Main aapka kar dungi. Maine unki baaton pe vishwas rakha last time jo pay kiya tha maine usko pay kar diya.
Executive: Bilkul pay kiya hai sir. Main amount ki baat uske baad amount ki baat hogi. Unhone bola aapko 29500 pay karna. Humne 29500 pay kar diya.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan haan. Nahi wo 29500 wo consider nahi hota hai.
Executive: Unhone proposal bhi do do do do bari proposal bheja. Bheja ek bari thoda do do bari proposal bheja. 29500 29500.
Customer: Haan main samajh rahi hoon main sari baat aapki samajh rahi hoon. Main aapki baat se deny nahi kar rahi hoon. But ye hai na ki abhi wo complete nahi ho pa raha hai aage ka process. Wo hamari team jo hai na jo oversi clear karti hai jo backend team hai wo 28000 plus 18% hi consider kar rahi hai. Theek hai wo unhone ye cheez bhi to accept kiya na ki unse galti ho gayi. Sir galti insan se ho jati hai by default ho gayi hai. To remaining jo payment hai na wo karwa dijiye aap.
Customer: Are madam nahi kara aap band kar do refund kar do.
Executive: Sir next time se bahut time se chal raha hai aapki services aur bahut sare amount ki baat hai.
Customer: Aise aise aise kya fayda aap aise kya baat kar diya bhai ki koi kuch kahe kuch kahe koi kuch dusra kya hai aise thodi na vyapar karna hai. Main aapko kuch nahi keh raha hai aapse aap bilkul aapko hamare aap batao jab maine 29500 pay kar diya aap tab aapko ab yaad aa raha ki 3-4000 aur dalo to dalo.
Executive: Sir bina un services ko profile bhi run nahi hoti hai aur hum hum aapko
Customer: Ye to madam kisi ko fasaane ka wo hai ki laalach use bata diya last time pay karne ke liye pay kar diya tha. Ab madam close kar do nahi nahi karna IndiaMART ke sath nahi jana aage band kar do hamara.
Executive: Sir main bahut jyada aapse demand to nahi kar rahe hain hum best service ke liye demand kar rahe hain aapse.
Customer: Demand ki baat hi nahi hai. Demand ki baat hi nahi hai ye baat hai.
Customer: Wo
Customer: Demand ki baat hi nahi hai. Agar main demand ki baat hoti to agar agar mujhe hota to main wo bhi pay kar deta. Demand ki baat hi nahi hai. Jab aadmi ko ek baar jo jhoot bol ke use fasa ke dobara se use wo kara to kya matlab usse raha hai.
Executive: Sir jhoot nahi bola gaya aapse agar jhoot bola gaya hota to shayad
Customer: Madam aise to hazaron service provider hain Justdial Just main nahi unke sath ek ek dedh saal unse kiya nahi kiya maine nahi unki service li. Isi vajah se nahi li ki koi bol de kuch hai kar de kuch hai.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART ne aapse kuch bol ke kuch to nahi kiya na aap ye bhi to dekhiye pehli baar wo galti hogi to aap uske liye itna
Customer: Galti ho gayi theek hai koi baat nahi aap refund kar do. Waise bhi itna time mere paas hai nahi main emergency mein unke liye sham ko raat ko 8:00 baje time nikala maine.
Executive: Sir refund process to nahi hota hai hamare side se aur agar refund hoga to puri service band ho jayegi aapko koi pata hoga ye sari cheeze. Theek hai do teen paanch ₹6000 ki baatein hain sir. Usko proceed kar denge to hamara profile kitne time se achcha chal raha hai aisa bhi nahi hai ki achcha nahi chal raha hai. Neha aapko bilkul
Executive: Sir Neha aapko achchi services de rahi hain jinse bhi aapko connect karti hain. Koi bhi problem aata hai to aap IndiaMART ko connect karte hain IndiaMART aapko ROI bhi de raha hai. Thodi si ek by mistake galti ki vajah se aap keh rahe hain ki humne jo hai na aap log ne ye ye kar diya tha. Aap ye bhi to samjhiye koi bhi insan hota hai kisi se galtiyan ho jati hain. Aisa bhi nahi hai ki wo accept nahi kar rahi hain accept to kar rahi hain na aapke samne aap friend se bola.
Customer: Ye batayiye acceptance kya hoga wo
Executive: Sir hum aapko service dete hain na agar aap aise tar ke bitar ke ki baat kar rahe hain to ye bhi to dekhiye ki hum bulk order bhi to dete hain na aapko hum bulk mein ye nahi bolte na ki aapne ye service di hum bulk nahi denge. But IndiaMART aapko ROI generate karke de rahi hai na. Aap ye bhi to tally kijiye aap ek point of view pe ek atak jaye ki nahi hume yahi bola gaya tha. But dusra uska point of view dekhiye ki IndiaMART ko aapko kitna ROI de rahi hai. Itne purane clients hain direct inquiries aa rahi hain direct calls aa rahe hain. Agar ROI mein dikkat hoti to aap mujhse bolte ROI mein dikkat nahi hai. Ek proposal ke mistake se aap ye mujhse bol rahe hain ya kisi aur person se bol rahe hain. But usko feedback leke utariye apna chart agar IndiaMART ne aapko ROI nahi diya itne time se aap hain. 506 saalon se hai na aap to itna to de rahi hai aapko ROI sir. Aisa bhi nahi hai ki aapke aapko services mein koi problem ho. Service mein koi problem nahi isi vajah se aap IndiaMART pe kar rahe hain. Agar services mein koi problem hoti to jaise aapne Justdial ko mein nahi kiya hai aapne Trade India mein nahi kiya waise aap IndiaMART pe bhi nahi karte. Aap ye bhi to samjhiye. To dono side se jo hai na business chalta hai ek aapke side se ek hamare side se sir. Aur aisa bhi nahi hai ki sir ki humse koi mistake nahi hogi aapse bhi kuch cheeze mistake hui hongi jiske liye aapne apologies kiya hoga.
Customer: Madam suno mistake wali unhone mujhse kaha jo aap last time aapne pay kiya tha wahi pay kar do. Batayiye.
Executive: Sir main maan rahi hoon main maan rahi hoon unhone kaha hoga.
Customer: Aur aap pichla dekh lijiyega jo mera pichla jo aapne last pay kiya tha wahi hum regularly pay karte aa rahe hain.
Executive: Haan bilkul bilkul aapne kiya hoga sir but is timing pe service thodi si aur standard ho gayi hai aur achchi buyleads mil rahi hai aur achcha client flow aa raha hai. Is vajah se hum 25000 nahi de paye. Unhone socha tha ki wo karwa lenge par nahi approval mil raha hai sir ab. Unhone isi vajah se aapse bola ki aap kar dijiye agar unko pata hota to wo samne se mana nahi kar deti ki nahi hum nahi hum nahi kar payenge.
Customer: Unhone kuch surety li hogi ab wo surety nahi approval nahi mil pa raha hai. Thoda sa hi amount ki baat hai jyada amount ki to baat bhi nahi hai. Aapne 29500 kiya hai.
Customer: Chalo main karata hoon.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko link provide karaun. Main sham ko pahunchunga scanner pe karenge madam scanner pe karenge ya kaise karenge?
Customer: Main sham ko pahunchunga wahi net banking se karunga.
Executive: Net banking se karenge. Theek hai kitne baje main Neha se bolun call karne ke liye?
Customer: Main 6:00 baje ke baad pahunchta hoon madam.
Executive: Aur haan ek aapka na concern aaya hua tha wahi incoming wala to wo usko main close kar do?
Customer: Haan kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai main close kar deti hoon. Thank you so much sir. Theek hai main aapko na 6:30 baje tak Neha se call karwati hoon aur aap pay kar dijiyega wo amount. Aur mujhe exact amount bata dijiye kitna mujhe transfer karna ho raha hai. 35000 na?
Customer: Haan bilkul bilkul.
Executive: ₹3340 ka hota hai. Theek hai 28000 plus 18% GST ka.
Customer: Ab exact amount whatsapp karwa dijiye main karata hoon sham ko.
Executive: Theek hai bahut bahut dhanyavad sir. Aapko dena hai ₹3340. Theek hai main exact amount karwa de rahi hoon Neha se aur 6:30 baje Neha aapko connect kar lengi. Ye jo main na aapka jo concern hai wo close karwa rahi hoon please feed back satisfied kar dijiyega. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was promised a lower rate.

- Customer is now asked to pay more.

- Feels misled by IndiaMART representative.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the mistake.

- Customer agreed to pay the remaining amount.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share payment link via WhatsApp.

- Neha will call the customer by 6:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, payment, gst, proposal, buyleads
